game.name: Mermaid Princesses
game.description:
Have you ever imagined your favorite princesses in the dresses of cute and lovely mermaids? If not, check out this brand new dressing game for girls and see four popular princesses Belle, Cinderella, Ariel  and Rapunzel wearing mermaid outfits designed by you. Choose the princess and start making your own creation with the help of options you can see on the right side of the screen of Mermaid Princesses Game! All the princesses have already got impressed by your fashion designer skills, so do not let them feel down.

Choose from multiple varieties of crop top primarily inspired by their wider collection of beautiful gowns! Do not forget to add a glittery fish tail, which would surely help them to get a real mermaid look. Give your chosen princess a superb scepter that is highly valued for allowing mermaids to control the ocean in this one of best girls games! The neck of princess also needs a sparkling necklace and you cannot ignore adorning her with accessories like underwater flowers, sea stars or seasheels.

Feel free to add some fun tattoos to your chosen princesses to take your fantasy to the next level in this one of the coolest html5 mermaid games for kids! These cool princesses are anxiously waiting to go on a completely new adventure of their lives. So, join the fun, put your styling sense abilities to test to make them look like the real-life mermaids. Good luck to help each of the four princesses to make their dream come true! Enjoy more free princess dress-up games online, no download required on atmegame.com!
